00008 Levenshtein::Levenshtein(vector<unsigned int> trans, vector<unsigned int> ref)
00009 {
00010         // init vectors
00011         trans_v = trans;
00012         ref_v = ref;
00013 
00014         // init Matrix
00015         matrix.resize(trans.size()+1);
00016 
00017         for (unsigned int i=0; i<matrix.size(); i++)
00018                 matrix[i].resize(ref.size()+1);
00019 
00020         for (unsigned int i=0; i<matrix[0].size(); i++)
00021                 matrix[0][i]=i;
00022 
00023         for (unsigned int i=1; i<matrix.size(); i++)
00024                 matrix[i][0] = i;
00025 
00026         
00027         // fill Matrix
00028         for (unsigned int i=1; i < matrix.size(); i++){
00029                 for (unsigned int j=1; j<matrix[i].size(); j++){
00030                         // matching
00031                         unsigned int min = matrix[i-1][j-1];
00032 
00033                         // deletion
00034                         if (min > matrix[i-1][j])
00035                                         min = matrix[i-1][j];
00036 
00037                         // insertion
00038                         if (min > matrix[i][j-1])
00039                                         min = matrix[i][j-1];
00040 
00041                         if (trans[i] != ref[j])
00042                                 matrix[i][j] = min + 1; 
00043                         else
00044                                 matrix[i][j] = min;
00045                 }
00046         }
00047 }
00048 
00049 unsigned int Levenshtein::getDistance()
00050 {
00051         unsigned int i = matrix.size()-1;
00052         unsigned int j = matrix[matrix.size()-1].size()-1;
00053         return matrix[i][j];
00054 }

00056 string Levenshtein::getPath(Lexicon &lex)
00057 {
00058         string path_ops = this->getPathOps();
00059 
00060         string path = "";
00061         unsigned int trans_counter = 0, ref_counter = 0;
00062 
00063         for (unsigned int i=0; i<path_ops.size(); i++)
00064         {
00065                 switch (path_ops[i])
00066                 {
00067                         case 'm':
00068                                 path += "(m:"+lex.getWord(trans_v[trans_counter])+")";
00069                                 trans_counter++;
00070                                 ref_counter++;
00071                                 break;
00072                         case 'i':
00073                                 path += "(i:"+lex.getWord(ref_v[ref_counter])+")";
00074                                 ref_counter++;
00075                                 break;
00076                         case 'd':
00077                                 path += "(d:"+lex.getWord(trans_v[trans_counter])+")";
00078                                 trans_counter++;
00079                                 break;
00080                 }
00081         }
00082         return path;
00083 }

00085 string Levenshtein::getPathOps()
00086 {
00087         unsigned int i=matrix.size()-1;
00088         unsigned int j=matrix[0].size()-1;
00089         string res = "";
00090         while (!((i==0)&&(j==0)))
00091         {
00092                 if(i==0){
00093                         j--;
00094                         res = "i" + res;
00095                 }else{
00096                         if (j==0){
00097                                 i--;
00098                                 res = "d" + res;
00099                         }else{
00100                                 if ((matrix[i-1][j-1]<=matrix[i][j-1])&&(matrix[i-1][j-1]<=matrix[i-1][j])){
00101                                         i--;
00102                                         j--;
00103                                         res = "m" + res;
00104                                 }else{
00105                                         if (matrix[i][j-1]<matrix[i-1][j]){
00106                                                 j--;
00107                                                 res = "d" + res;
00108                                         }else{
00109                                                 if (matrix[i][j-1]==matrix[i-1][j]){
00110                                                         if (i<=j){
00111                                                                 j--;
00112                                                                 res = "i" + res;
00113                                                         }else{
00114                                                                 i--;
00115                                                                 res = "d" + res;
00116                                                         }
00117                                                 }else{
00118                                                         i--;
00119                                                         res = "d" + res;
00120                                                 }
00121                                         }
00122                                 }
00123                         }
00124                 }
00125         }
00126         return res;
00127 }
